title: Stratos 4 OVA
synopsis: After successfully returning to Earth on the renovated Stratos 4, the four main characters are visited by the Comet Blasters Chizuru Kubo and Annette Kerry, who bring them a shocking video.  Meanwhile, Orbital Station 7 is in serious trouble...
